thread.section_title: TopVintage Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van TopVintage | topvintage.net
thread.title: Amanda

author: Amanda
title: Amanda
text:
My dress arrived promptly within the suggested time frame. Business with Top Vintage was smooth.
I order the velvet 30s-inspired mermaid dress. Since I was between sizes I ordered up, and I'm glad I did. The dress hugs the body form comfortably; if I had ordered down the dress would have been to snug for my personal comfort. The dress itself is tailored beautifully. I didn't want to take it off after trying it on.
